title: Will we have to come to campus in final year?
content: I finished 3rd year and wanted to know how many classes we will have in the 4th year. Is it all completely online or will we have to come to campus in 7th and 8th sem?

comments.body: No need to go to campus at all for classes. Only need to go for capstone and exams and placements

How often is that? 

Like i know it'll be none if i don't go, but just generally to get a rough idea of the frequency

Isa 1 - 2 or 3 times

Isa 2 - 2 or 3 times 

Esa - 2 or 3 times

Capstone - 4 reviews 

Placements depends on u

Dude the only thing I wanted to know about was placements ðŸ˜­. 

Say I've got an 8.5 gpa, and apply for every company under the sun, how often would I need to go. And are the OAs generally online, or in the assessment center
Prob twice to thrice in the initial weeks
What do you mean 4 reviews for capstone?Is it not 2 like 5th and 6th sem?
I mean we had 4 in 6th sem as well so might be different for u guys
